Player History
Released by Houston on 8/26/1967...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 8/26/1967 to a 1-year deal worth $1,188,000 per year...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/2/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Drafted in 4th round, 68th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1975...
Injured on 5/10/1976 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/9/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Released by Chicago (A) on 10/24/1986...
Drafted in 5th round, 93rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1987...
Injured on 7/1/1988 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
